description: Mashes, minifies (Google Closure Tools, YUI Compressor for .Net, Ajax Minifier, or Uglify.js), and validates your javascript (JsHint), stylesheet (CSSLint), and dotless files. | Please install with chocolatey (http://nuget.org/List/Packages/chocolatey).
author: Evan Nagle, Wayne Brantley, Francis Noel
